original_text: When they saw the courage of Peter and John and realized that they were unschooled, ordinary men, they were astonished and they took note that these men had been with Jesus.
korean_text: 그들이 베드로와 요한이 담대하게 말함을 보고 그들을 본래 학문 없는 범인으로 알았다가 이상히 여기며 또 전에 예수와 함께 있던 줄도 알고

sentences.original_text: When they saw the courage of Peter and John
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 베드로와 요한의 용기를 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: and realized that they were unschooled, ordinary men
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 배우지 못한 평범한 사람들이라는 것을 깨달았을 때

sentences.original_text: that these men had been with Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람들이 예수님과 함께 있었다는 것을
